bibl.title: Territory of Washington vs. George Smith
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: District Court for the Fourth Judicial District of Washington Territory

div1.p: 2251 Territory of Washington vs George Smith To the Clerk of the District Court Spokane Falls
In the District Court. Term, A.D. 188_ The Territory of Washington vs. George Smith Indictment for COST BILL.

George Smith. 2251 Clerks Fees, D.A. Clement, Clerk Socket .25 Appearance .50 + file Transcripts .35 + file Indictment .60 Arraingment .50 Certified copy Indictment 2.00 Plea .50 Issue Subpoena .50 Red + file .35 Issue Subpoena .50 Red + file .35 Issue joined .50 Calling jury .25 Swear to answer questions .25 Swear & talesmen .45 Swear jury to try case .25 Swear 7 witnesses 1.05 Swear bailiff .15 Receive + file verdict .35 Calling jury 3 times .75 Sentence .50 Certified copy sentence 2.00 Take claims 5 witnesses .75 Affidavits to claims 1.25 File affidavits .50 Issue certificates 2.50 Taxing costs .50 Final record 2.80 Five transcripts 2.40 Five certificates 2.00 25.60 Carried Forward 25.60

Brot forward $25.60 Witnesses before Court Frank L. Graves 2 days + 2 miles 4.20 Charles M. Graves 2 days + 2 miles 4.20 Charles D. Colwell 5 days 2 miles 10.20 Louis Goldberg 1 day + 2 miles 2.10 Joseph Deversky 2 days + 2 miles 4.20 25.00

J.R Snyder, J.P. 1888 June 2 Socketing Lease 25 " " Filing Complt. 15 Affidavit 25 40 " " Issuing warrant, filing 15 1.15 " " Affidavit .25 " " Entering Appearance .25 " " Continuance .50 " " Issuing subpoena 25 Filing 15 .40 " " 2 Add. names .20 " " Swearing 4 witnesses .60 " " Entering Judgment .50 " " Taxing costs.50 " " Taking 3 witness Bonds 50 cents each 1.50 " " Filing 3 bonds .45 " " Issuing Commitment .50 Making Transcript 10 folios. 20 cents each 2.00 certificate 1.00
J.F. Warren June 2 Serving Warrant 1.00, 2 miles .20 1.20 " " Attending Court 3.00 " " Commuting to Jail 1.00 3.60 ' " Serving subpoena, 1.20 2 miles .20 1.40 6.60
Witness Fees June " Charles D. Colwell, 1 day 2.00, 2 miles .20 2.20 " " C.M. Graves, 1 day 2.00, 2 miles .20 2.20 " " F.L. Graves, 1 day 2.00, 2 miles .20 2.20 6.60 Carried Forward 74.25

June 6 To Serving Subpoena Five names @ 40c. " " " Mileage Four miles @10c. " " " Serving Subpoena One name @40c. " " " Mileage Five miles @10c. " 8 " Commitment Calling jury three times @ 25c. Summoning Three Extra Jurors @25c. Bringing prisoner into town 3 times @50c. 1.50 5.80 4.30 Total $80.05

CERTIFICATE OF PROSECUTING ATTORNEY. I hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing bill of costs, and the same amounting to the sum of $69.15 is just and correct. W.C. Jones Prosecuting Attorney for Spokane County

CERTIFICATE OF PRESIDING JUDGE. I certify that I have examined the foregoing Bill of Costs, amounting to the sum of $69.15 and the same appearing to be just and correct, is hereby approved and allowed David Allen Associate Justice Supreme Court Washington Territory and Judge Fourth Judicial District
In the District Court of Wasington Terriory. Fourth Judicial District 2251 Term at The Territory of Washington vs. GEO Smith BILL OF COSTS
